name: Jan Unger
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Wrote my first JS UI component in 2008 when stuff like that was called 'DHTML'. I've been using JS in my daily business since then.
what_can_i_contribute: The more I learn about JS, the more I realize how little I know about it. I'm happy to share what I've learned about using JS in a web browser and I'm eager to learn more about ES6, node.js and React.
